articles.title: Greetings to Kenyan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kenyan President
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Uhuru Kenyatta, president of the Republic of Kenya, on Monday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence, the national holiday of the Kenyan people.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations existing between the DPRK and Kenya would steadily develop, sincerely wishing the president and people of Kenya greater success in their work for achieving the independent development of the country and defending the regional peace and security.

articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Chad
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Chad
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message to Kalzeube Pahimi on Tuesday, congratulating him on his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Chad.
					 The message wished the prime minister big success in his responsible work for attaining the country's socio-economic development.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin Wednesday hosted a reception to mark the 20th anniversary of the establishment of the Russian Federal Constitution. 
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association; Hong So Hon, president of Kim Chaek University of Technology who is chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Parliamentary Group; officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and members of international bodies here. 
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy here were present at the reception.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Koreans in the U.S. Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Koreans in the U.S. Arrives
Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Kim Hyon Hwan, secretary general of the federation, arrived here on Wednesday to take part in the memorial events to be held on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Exhibitions under Way for Participants of Construction Workshop
articles.content:
Exhibitions under Way for Participants of Construction Workshop
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Exhibitions are now under way at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Three-Revolution Exhibition House. They are now being visited by the participants in the great workshop for officials in the field of construction. 
					 Photo and book exhibitions and another exhibition of designs and lay-outs are now being held at the indoor stadium.
					
					 On display at the photo exhibition are photos documenting the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the field of Juche-based architecture and painstaking efforts of supreme leader Kim Jong Un opening up the great heyday in the construction and other photos. 
					
					 Displayed at the book exhibition are famous works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on architecture and books dealing with their virtues and technical books on construction. 
					
					 On display at the design and lay-out exhibition are more than 220 architectural designs and lay-outs including monumental edifices, public buildings, apartment houses and greening designs and lay-outs which introduces the developing appearance and future of the Juche-based architecture. 
					
					 There are exhibitions of building materials, construction equipment, construction methods, utensils and tools at the New Technology Hall of the exhibition house. 
					
					 On display at the exhibition of building materials are thousands of pieces of materials for capital construction, finishing materials, fittings and furniture, etc. produced by building materials bases of the country. 
					
					 Displayed at the exhibition of building equipment are equipment and charts necessary for construction in wide use in the country and several countries.
					
					 On display at the exhibition of construction methods and utensils and tools are visual materials, multi-media and utensils and tools of 1,200 varieties.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Show Held
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Show Held
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK book, photo and handicraft show is taking place at the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students opened in Ecuador.
					 It was opened with due ceremony on Dec. 8.
					
					 On display there were photos documenting undying feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed and photos introducing monumental edifices built under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were their famous works, picture albums and handicrafts.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were delegations of youth and students of the DPRK and other countries and delegates of international bodies.
					
					 The participants placed a floral basket before portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 And speeches were made.
					
					 They looked round the exhibits and enjoyed an art performance of the DPRK delegation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il had worked heart and soul for the national reunification and prosperity till the last moments of his life.
					 He made public such celebrated works as "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" and "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" to indicate the ways for the country's reunification. And he formulated as the three charters for national reunification the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme for great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 To bring earlier the national reunification, he provided a historic north-south summit in Pyongyang in Juche 89 (2000), at which the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted. The adoption of the joint declaration made it possible for all Koreans to dynamically advance toward the country's reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 Multi-faceted contacts and dialogues, including ministerial talks, gained momentum between the north and the south of Korea, while roads and railways, severed for decades, were reconnected and air and sea routes opened.
					
					 In October 2007 another inter-Korean summit took place in Pyongyang, at which the Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity was adopted. The event was attributable to the devoted efforts made by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people praise him as the sun of the nation as he established the principle of keeping independence in the movement for national reunification and ushered in a new era of national independence and reunification with his unique idea and distinguished guidance.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotic devotion and feats for national reunification will remain in the history of the nation forever.

articles.title: Construction of Pyongyang City Associated with Feats of Peerlessly Great Men (2)
articles.content:
Construction of Pyongyang City Associated with Feats of Peerlessly Great Men (2)
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang has now turned into a world-level city thanks to leader Kim Jong Il's idea on Juche-based architecture.
					 True to President Kim Il Sung's plan for turning Pyongyang into a grandiose city, Kim Jong Il began opening the heydays of Pyongyang with construction of the Mansudae Art Theatre and Rakwon Street.
					
					 He saw to it that downtown Pyongyang was wonderfully built with Kim Il Sung's statue on Mansu Hill as centre. He ensured that the Changgwang Street was modernly built in the heart of the city, followed by Munsu Street on the bank of the River Taedong and Taehak (university) and An Sang Thaek streets.
					
					 His energetic guidance led to the construction of the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, Grand People's Study House, Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Changgwang Health Complex, Ice Rink, Chongryu Restaurant, Pyongyang Metro and other edifices
					
					 Later, Pyongyang took on more grandiose looks with appearance of Kwangbok, Chongchun and Thongil streets, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, Pyongyang Circus Theater, May Day Stadium, etc.
					
					 In May Juche 80 (1991), Kim Jong Il made public a work "Theory of Architectural Art", which deals with guidelines to be maintained in developing the nation's architecture on a higher level.
					
					 Even in the period of the Arduous March, the forced march, when the country was hard pressed for anything, he gave an instruction on building the Chongryu Bridge (2nd stage) and Kumrung Tunnel No. 2, thus making the construction in the city go nonstop. In coincidence with their construction, there appeared in Pyongyang September 9 and Mansudae streets, April 25 Hotel and Monument to Party Foundation.
					
					 Such edifices as Mansudae Street and the National Theatre took their shapes one after another in the city in the new century.
					
					 The present-day looks of Pyongyang are a result of the devoted efforts made by Kim Jong Il, a great master of architectural art.

articles.title: S. Korean Dictatorial Regime Bound to Face Stern Judgment by History: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Dictatorial Regime Bound to Face Stern Judgment by History: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet conservative group is bound to face a stern judgment by history as it is enforcing a dictatorial rule quite contrary to the will and demand of the people, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The present south Korean regime has become a target of judgment by the people and should be toppled. Because these ruling forces are a group of traitors who turned their backs on the people in the light of their historical roots, their criminal acts through which they illegally seized power in violation of democracy and their dastardly moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 Since the present ruling forces came to power in south Korea, the "yusin" dictatorship has openly revived.  This is the unanimous comment of the public at home and abroad.
					
					 South Korea has turned into a dark land where the departed soul of the "yusin" dictatorship is haunting in less than one year of the puppet group's office.
					
					 The present puppet regime emerged through a coup as it seized power by an illegal method.
					
					 As disclosed, the regime is made up of political gangsters who usurped power through fraud and red herring by letting all power organs and conservative media interfere in the "presidential" election last year.
					
					 The present dictatorial regime is hell-bent on fascist crackdown quite contrary to public mind-set.
					
					 The south Korean people from all walks of life are now waging a massive struggle against the regime, greatly infuriated by its desperate moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship and stamp out the progressive and democratic forces.
					
					 The slogan of the struggle put up by the people is just and their actions for bringing down the dictatorial regime will inevitably lead to all people resistance.

articles.title: At Least 20,000 S. Korean People Condemn Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
At Least 20,000 S. Korean People Condemn Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- 25 political parties and civic and public organizations including the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the People's Action for Opposing War and Realizing Peace and the Unified Progressive Party held an emergency rally on the situation  in Seoul on Dec. 7, declaring judgment of the  Park Geun Hye regime.
					 It was attended by more than 20,000 people from all walks of life.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the meeting.
					
					 It said that no sooner had the regime taken office than peace was threatened and it reneged on its commitments.
					
					 The departed soul of "yusin" has been called back in south Korea, it has turned into a lawless land for the tycoons and the division persists, it noted.
					
					 It condemned the regime's act of covering up truth about the fraudulent election conducted with all power bodies involved, the suppression of the south Korean Teachers Union and the Government Employees' Union, the witch hunt for eliminating "forces following the north" and  the deterioration of the people's living.
					
					 It said that the Park regime's revival of "yusin" itself shows its weakness.
					
					 It called upon all people including the workers, peasants and poor people to turn out in the actions to judge the regime.
					
					 At the end of the rally, its participants staged a demonstration.

articles.title: S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Accused of Its Self-justified Action
articles.content:
S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Accused of Its Self-justified Action
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea in a commentary Monday denounced the "Saenuri Party" for its self-justified acts. 
					 It recalled that a lawmaker from the Democratic Party on Sunday called last year's "presidential election" fraudulent and urged Park Geun Hye to resign. 
					
					 In this regard, the "Saenuri Party" branded his call as "non-compliance with the results of the presidential election" and is working hard to divest him of membership of the "National Assembly", the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 Its attempt to suppress the lawmaker, taking issue with his remarks reflecting public resentment at the present "government", is reminiscent of the period of "yusin".
					
					 The arrogant attitude of the "Saenuri Party" reveals the instinct of dictatorship once again. 
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" would be well advised to properly understand the reason why even the lawmaker is calling for the resignation of the chief executive in the wake of the protest of the religious circle and why people are growing so angry.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Stage Combined Command Exercises
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Stage Combined Command Exercises
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The 2nd division of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea are staging combined command exercises together with the south Korean puppet army in Tongduchon, Kyonggi Province.
					 The puppet warmongers declared that the drills would last till December 15 with an aim to step up the combat preparations together with U.S. forces.
					
					 Such ceaseless saber-rattling targeted on the DPRK is rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula tenser.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet to Remember Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet to Remember Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen Wednesday met at Nampho Port to remember leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise. 
					 Prior to the meeting they laid a floral basket before the mosaic depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were captains and crewmen of Vietnamese-flagged ship "Daiduongqueen" and Panamanian-flagged ship "Oupulai 18." 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il was an iron-willed and brilliant commander who defended socialism from sanctions of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces and their moves to stifle it with his unique Songun politics. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il inherited the noble idea of Kim Il Sung of believing in the people as in Heaven and devoted his all to the people's happiness, they said. 
					
					 They stressed that now the Korean people are working hard to build a thriving nation and achieve the reunification of the country, united close around supreme leader Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They noted that they extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people dynamically struggling for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Nina Andreyeva, general secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, contributed an article titled "In remembrance of Comrade Kim Jong Il" to the December issue of the Russian paper Serp I Molot on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Noting Kim Jong Il dedicated himself to the sovereignty of the country and happiness of its people all his life, the article said:
					
					 Thanks to his devoted efforts for bolstering up the defence capabilities, socialist Korea has demonstrated its might as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state despite the U.S. constant and harsh blockade.
					
					 The U.S. dares not to provoke the DPRK as it is well aware that it can not escape merciless punishment by the latter.
					
					 No one has the right to deter the DPRK from having access to nukes.
					
					 Nukes for the DPRK serve as the only means for self-defence under the present situation where it stands in acute confrontation with imperialism. The nukes are also a strong deterrence for it to foil the U.S. moves to provoke another war.
					
					 As evidenced by the situation on the Korean Peninsula this year, the world could escape a nuclear holocaust as the DPRK has become a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Kim Jong Il passed away too early while dedicating his whole life to the cause of protecting world peace. But he remains alive forever in our hearts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Serbian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Serbian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, released a statement on December 5 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said that all the party members of the New Yugoslav Communist Party are remembering with deep emotion the noble career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to accomplishing the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and thoroughly embodied it to socialist construction, turning the DPRK into the political, ideological and military power. 
					
					 He performed distinguished exploits in party building and activities while leading the Workers' Party of Korea for a long time. His theory on party building and leadership feats serve as a genuine textbook which all the progressive political parties should take as guidelines in their struggle.
					
					 He pursued the unique Songun politics to defend socialism and safeguard the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the world, foiling the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 His idea and cause are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The New Yugoslav Communist Party is convinced that the Korean people would surely realize the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Indonesian Personage Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Indonesian Personage Praises Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, released a statement on December 5 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 The life of Kim Jong Il is the noble one of the distinguished leader who devoted his all to realizing the human cause of independence.
					
					 He pursued the unique Songun politics true to the cause of President Kim Il Sung and wisely led the party, state and army, turning the DPRK into a political and military power the U.S. dares not to provoke.
					
					 His august name and immortal exploits will always be cherished in the hearts of the progressive mankind including the Korean and Indonesian peoples.
					
					 I am convinced that the Korean people led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il will build a thriving nation without fail.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, the Mongolian Politics and Business School and the Syrian newspaper Al Usubuu Al Riadih held remembrance meetings from Dec. 1 to 3 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Ta Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee, said:
					
					 The great H.E. Kim Jong Il dedicated his whole life to the people's happiness, country's prosperity and global cause of independence.
					
					 He is boundlessly revered by the Korean people and progressive humankind for his exploits.
					
					 D. Narantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, and other speakers said that the demise of Kim Jong Il was the greatest loss to the human cause of independence. The exploits he performed by developing the Juche idea, Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and establishing a Juche-oriented socialist power by embodying it will shine for all ages, they added.
					
					 A vice-manager of the Syrian paper lauded the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's was the life of the great benevolent father of the people who dedicated his all to the country and its people.
					
					 He was a great man who performed undying exploits for the global cause of independence and a close friend of the Arabs.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Kenia por dia de independencia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Kenia por dia de independencia
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 9 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Kenia, Uhuru Muigai Kenyatta, por el 50o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais africano, fiesta nacional del pueblo keniano.
					En su mensaje, el remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre Corea y Kenia se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro tambien y desea de todo corazon al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en sus labores para lograr el desarrollo independiente del pais y preservar la paz y seguridad de la region.

articles.title: Exposiciones para participantes en gran cursillo de funcionarios de rama de construccion
articles.content:
Exposiciones para participantes en gran cursillo de funcionarios de rama de construccion
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tienen lugar en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones las exposiciones para los participantes en el gran cursillo de los funcionarios de la rama de construccion, respectivamente.
					En el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang se realizan la exposicion de fotos y libros y la de  proyectos de conformacion de disenos.
					
					En la exposicion de fotos estan exhibidas las fotos alusivas a las hazanas inmortales de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il acumuladas en la rama de arquitectura autoctona.
					
					Tambien se ven las fotos que muestran los trabajos del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien abre la era dorada de la construccion y otros datos.
					
					En la exhibicion de libros se ven las obras de los Generalisimos sobre la arquitectura, libros relativos a sus virtudes y tecnicos de la rama de construccion.
					
					En la exposicion de planes de conformacion de los disenos arquitectonicos, fueron expuestos mas de 220 proyectos para los edificios monumentales y publicos, viviendas y arboledas que demuestran el aspecto de desarrollo y la perspectiva de la arquitectura autoctona.
					
					En el pabellon de nueva innovacion tecnica de la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones, tienen lugar la exposicion de los materiales y equipos de construccion y la de metodos de construccion y herramientas.
					
					En la de materiales de construccion estan exhibidos millares de los materiales de construccion principal y los de acabado de construccion, los herrajes y muebles presentados  por las bases de produccion de los materiales de Corea.
					
					En la de equipos de construccion estan expuestos junto con esquemas los equipos de toda indole que se desarrollan y se usan ampliamente en Corea y en el mundo.
					
					Ademas en la exposicion de metodos de construccion y herramientas se ven los medios visuales, los multimedias y las herramientas de mas de mil 200 especies.
					
					Los participantes en el cursillo recorren las exposiciones.

articles.title: EE.UU. y Sur de Corea realizan ejercicios conjuntos de puesto de mando
articles.content:
EE.UU. y Sur de Corea realizan ejercicios conjuntos de puesto de mando
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La 2a division de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea realiza hasta el dia 15 con el ejercito surcoreano los ejercicios conjuntos de puesto de mando en Tongduchon de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					Los belicistas titeres anunciaron oficialmente que los ejercicios se despliegan para el fortalecimiento de la disposicion de combate junto con las tropas estadounidenses.
					
					Los yanquis y los belicistas surcoreanos siguen recurriendo a la campana de guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, exacerbando de continuo la situacion regional.
